name: Brian Osman
title: Principal Consultant
introtext: We deliver training that is based on improving the way testers see, think, interact with others and with the system under test. This is one way to show our value-add as testers. We are community focused liaising with like-minded, free thinking testers and take the opportunity to present at conferences and SIGsT groups.

values.valuetext: You may have hidden the plans in the escape pod but we will send a detachment down to retrieve them, and have our Commanders see to it personally. Therell be no one to stop us this time!
Alderaan was a peaceful planet. It had no weapons. You cant possibly… we have traced the Rebel spies to her. Now she is my only link to finding their secret base.

Kid, Ive flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. Ive seen a lot of strange stuff, but Ive never seen anything to make me believe theres one all-powerful Force controlling everything. Theres no mystical energy field that controls my destiny. Its all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense.
This will be a day long remembered. It has seen the end of Kenobi, and will soon see the end of the rebellion.
We don’t need to see your identification … Those aren’t the droids we’re looking for … You can go about your business … Move along
